con:request.name: presence-polling
con:request.con:request:
<orchestrationConfig> <target>_sensor-module-rest-json-http._tcp</target> <name>PresencePollingProviderConfiguration</name> <serialNumber>1</serialNumber> <lastUpdated>2017-09-25T08:11:13.161Z</lastUpdated> <orchestrationRules> <rule>services.wadl=default</rule> <rule>services.get-presence.enabled=true</rule> <rule>services.get-presence.whitelist=any</rule> <rule>activities.push-presence.enabled=false</rule> <rule>sla.global.abandonment-rate=0</rule> <rule>sla.global.asa.ms=500</rule> <rule>sla.global.tat.ms=500</rule> </orchestrationRules> </orchestrationConfig>
<!-- Mismatch with other payloads, see below --> <!--<orchestrationConfiguration> <lastUpdated>2017-09-25T08:11:13.161Z</lastUpdated> <name>test_configuration</name> <orchestrationRules> <rule>test_rule</rule> </orchestrationRules> <serialNumber>1</serialNumber> <target>test_target</target> </orchestrationConfiguration>-->

con:request.name: presence-pushing
con:request.con:request:
<orchestrationConfig> <target>_orch-s-ws-https._tcp</target> <name>PresencePushingProviderConfiguration</name> <serialNumber>1</serialNumber> <lastUpdated>2017-09-25T08:11:13.161Z</lastUpdated> <orchestrationRules> <rule>services.wadl=default</rule> <rule>services.get-presence.enabled=false</rule> <rule>activities.push-presence.enabled=true</rule> <rule>activities.push-presence.endpoint=http://127.0.0.1:8092/sensors/presence</rule> <rule>activities.push-presence.wadl=default</rule> <rule>activities.push-presence.wadl.method=pushPresence</rule> </orchestrationRules> </orchestrationConfig>
<!-- Mismatch with other payloads, see below --> <!--<orchestrationConfiguration> <lastUpdated>2017-09-25T08:11:13.161Z</lastUpdated> <name>test_configuration</name> <orchestrationRules> <rule>test_rule</rule> </orchestrationRules> <serialNumber>1</serialNumber> <target>test_target</target> </orchestrationConfiguration>-->

con:request.con:request:
